title: Bloger Menia
subtitle: Modern Content Publishing Platform
description: A feature-rich blogging platform built with Next.js and Django, offering a seamless writing and reading experience for content creators.

content.overview: Bloger Menia is a next-generation blogging platform designed for performance and SEO. It allows users to create, publish, and manage their blogs with an intuitive rich-text editor and real-time preview.
content.challenge: Existing platforms were either too complex or lacked customization. We needed a solution that offered the speed of a static site with the dynamic capabilities of a CMS, handling rich media and high traffic loads efficiently.
content.solution: We architected a solution using Next.js for a blazing fast frontend and Django for a robust backend. The platform supports markdown, image optimization, and features an advanced comment system and user profiles.

sections.title: Key Features
sections.content:
• SEO Optimized Rendering (SSR/ISR)
• Rich Text Editor with Markdown Support
• User Authentication & Profiles
• Categories & Tagging System
• Newsletter Integration

content.results: The platform achieved a Lighthouse score of 95+ in all categories. Engagement time increased by 40% due to the fast load times and clean UI.

testimonial.text: Bloger Menia offers the perfect balance between simplicity and power. It's my go-to platform for technical writing.
testimonial.author: Jay Patel

title: Trade Buddy Broker
subtitle: Algorithmic Trading & Automation System
description: An intelligent trading bot and brokerage interface that executes trades based on technical indicators and sentiment analysis.

content.overview: Trade Buddy Broker is an automated trading system connecting researchers and traders with stock brokers via APIs, specifically tailored for algorithmic trading strategies.
content.challenge: The main challenge was low latency execution and handling concurrent data streams from multiple exchanges without data loss. Ensuring thread safety and reliable error handling was critical for financial transactions.
content.solution: We utilized Flask for the API layer and Python's efficient data libraries (Pandas/NumPy) for strategy calculation. Celery was used for asynchronous task management to ensure non-blocking trade execution.

sections.title: Capabilities
sections.content:
• Real-time Market Data Streaming (WebSockets)
• Multi-Strategy Backtesting Engine
• Risk Management & Stop-Loss Automation
• Telegram/Email Alert Integration
• Portfolio Performance Tracking

content.results: The bot successfully automated high-frequency trades with a 99.9% execution success rate, significantly reducing manual intervention.

testimonial.text: The precision and speed of Trade Buddy are unmatched. It handles complex strategies effortlessly.
testimonial.author: Client

title: Office NJTechStudio
subtitle: Enterprise Project & Task Management
description: A comprehensive internal tool for managing office projects, assigning tasks, and tracking employee productivity.

content.overview: A dedicated portal for office environments to manage sprints, track bugs, and assign daily tasks to employees. It features a Kanban board, time tracking, and performance reporting modules.
content.challenge: Large teams often face communication gaps and unclear task priorities. The goal was to build a system that provides transparency and accountability without micromanagement.
content.solution: We built a scalable SaaS application with Next.js and Django. The system uses a role-based access control (RBAC) model to ensure data security and proper hierarchy management inside the organization.

sections.title: Core Modules
sections.content:
• Kanban Board for Task Management
• Sprint Planning & Backlogs
• Employee Time Tracking & Timesheets
• Automated Daily Standup Reports
• File Sharing & Document Management

content.results: Improved team velocity by 25% and reduced meeting times by leveraging the automated reporting features.

testimonial.text: This tool streamlined our entire workflow. It's clean, fast, and effective.
testimonial.author: HR Manager
